page.title: 02A girl at Tilshead School
page.content: I wake up at 7.00 and I get dressed. At 8.20 I leave home to go down to the bus by the village hall. Mr Devine drives the bus most mornings. I have one hamster and two rabbits. I feed them every morning and at night time. They are called Buffy, Starlight and Hazel. At school we go swimming at Warminster and we do art and craft. We sing with Mrs George. We go to swimming club on Monday nights if we want to. I go because it is great fun. We get back at about 5.00pm. When I get home from school I sometimes watch T.V. or I go up to the field behind the house where I live. Cows usually graze in the field. I have made a den by the field. There is some wire which you go through and my den is on the side of a chalk pit. I take my friends up there.
